title: Bug splat after champ select. Cant reconnect. HELP PLEASE!
body:
I have recently updated the new patch for League (6.15) and now every time i try to get into a game it crashes and a bug splat message pops up.
I have tried doing the repair but it just doesn't fix anything. I would greatly appreciate any help.
Thanks :)

replies.body: I recently have re-installed the client again and that seemed to have worked, thanks guys

Are you currently running the patcher via a pin on your task bar?  We've been tracking an issue where opening the client in this way could cause your client to crash upon loading.  We have this information and some resolutions steps provided in our [server status ](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na)currently.  Let me know if this is the case for you or not, and I'd be happy to help.
the new patch broke the game for some, i think the only fix now is reinstalling the client
